m_szDocTitle: Just a quick reminder: Always consider convergence/ combination of trends when predicting future developments : Futurology
m_szDocSumamry: Just a quick reminder: Always consider convergence/ combination of trends when predicting future developments : Futurology  535455textJust a quick reminder: Always consider convergence/ combination of trends when predicting future developments (self.Futurology)submitted 5 months ago * by justThisONeTiphereHello, just an obvious hint here, but obvious things are also fast forgotten. When you want do predicte future developments, you have to combine multiple technologies and trends and look and trend convergence. Why is that? Because 99% of time this is what happens. Innovations are almost alway
